knimeNode.name: PDB Downloader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to allow download of multiple RCSB PDB filetypes from a column of RCSB Structure IDs

fullDescription.intro:
This node, and the corresponding source node, allows the downloading of structure and sequence files from the RCSB PDB. The formats supported are:
PDB
mmCIF
Structure Factors
PDBML/XML (PDBx)
FASTA Format Sequence
PDB files are cast as PDB cells, and PDBML as XML cells. No checking the the structure IDs is carried out - invalid IDs will return cells containing missing values. WARNING - the PDBx option can result in very large tables!
This node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK). For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

option.name: Select a column containing the PDB IDs

fullDescription.option: Select a String column containing a list of PDB IDs
Select the desired file format(s) from the available options - PDB, mmCIF, Structure Factors, PDBML/XML (PDBx), FASTA Sequence

ports.inPort: Input Data table contaning a list of PDB IDs
ports.outPort: Output table with downloaded file(s) appended
